script.groovy:
def Table = headers.websocket.split(',')
request.headers.ville = Table[0] request.headers.frequence = Table[1] request.headers.dateDeb = Table[2] request.headers.dateFin = Table[3] request.headers.clef = Table[4]

to.uri: sql:SELECT * FROM CARBONINTENSITYHISTORY WHERE CITY = :#ville ORDER BY DATETEXTE?dataSource=ds_L1db
sql:SELECT * FROM CARBONINTENSITYHISTORY WHERE CITY = :#ville AND DATETEXTE > :#dateDeb AND DATETEXTE < :#dateFin ORDER BY DATETEXTE?dataSource=ds_L1db

script.groovy:
def Table = headers.websocket.split(',')
request.headers.ville = Table[0] request.headers.seuil = Table[1] request.headers.clef = Table[4]
